import { Container, Navbar, Nav } from 'react-bootstrap' import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' import { AppContext } from './AppContext.js' import { useContext } from 'react' import {Button} from 'react-bootstrap'; import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { observer } from 'mobx-react-lite' const NavBar = observer(() => { const { user, basket } = useContext(AppContext) return (
{user.isAuth ? ( ) : ( <> )} {user.isAdmin && ( )} {!!basket.count && ({basket.count})}
) }) export default NavBar
